en.screens.AppPasscode.ConfirmPasscodeSheet: App Passcodes can never be recovered if lost or forgotten! Make sure to note your passcode in a secure location before saving.
en.screens.AppPasscode.NewPasscode.InputPas: Cannot be used as a Passcode
This passcode will be required to open the Mapeo App
en.screens.AppPasscode.PasscodeIntro.descri: App Passcode allows you to add an additional layer of security by requiring that you enter a passcode in order to open the Mapeo app. You can define your own 5-digit passcode by turning on the feature below.
en.screens.AppPasscode.PasscodeIntro.warnin: **Please note that forgotten passcodes cannot be recovered!** Once this feature is enabled, if you forget or lose your passcode, you will not be able to open Mapeo and will lose access to any Mapeo data that has not been synced with other project participants.
en.screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.curr: You are currently using App Passcode. See below to stop using or change your passcode.
en.screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.desc: App Passcode adds an additional layer of security by requiring that you enter a passcode in order to open the Mapeo app.
en.screens.CameraScreen.noCameraAccess: No access to camera. Please Allow access in setting
en.screens.ObscurePasscode.description: Obscure Passcode is a security feature that allows you to open Mapeo in a decoy mode that hides all of your data. Entering the Obscure Passcode on the intro screen will display an empty version of Mapeo which allows you to create demonstration observations that are not saved to the Mapeo database.
en.screens.ObscurePasscode.instructions: Enter the code above to hide your data in Mapeo
en.screens.ObscurePasscode.title: Obscure Passcode
en.screens.Observation.title: Observation
en.screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.noGps: This observation does not have a location. You can continue waiting for a GPS signal, save the observation without a location, or enter coordinates manually
en.screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.weakG: GPS accuracy is low. You can continue waiting for better accuracy, save the observation with low accuracy, or enter coordinates manually
en.screens.ObservationsList.ObservationsEmp: Start from map or camera view to record your first observation.
en.screens.ObservationsList.error: Error loading observations. Try quitting and restarting Mapeo.
en.screens.ObservationsList.loading: Loading… this can take a while after synchronizing with a new device
en.screens.Security.title: Security
en.screens.Settings.appShareDesc: Install or update Mapeo on another phone
en.screens.Settings.title: Settings
